name: Nami
title: the Tidecaller
shortBio: A headstrong young vastaya of the seas, Nami was the first of the Marai tribe to leave the waves and venture onto dry land, when their ancient accord with the Targonians was broken. With no other option, she took it upon herself to complete the sacred ritual that would ensure the safety of her people. Amidst the chaos of this new age, Nami faces an uncertain future with grit and determination, using her Tidecaller staff to summon the strength of the oceans themselves.

skins.name: River Spirit Nami
skins.description: Once upon a time, a young farmer was enchanted by music coming from the deep jungle, and followed it to the grove of a river spirit. Overcome by her beauty, he went to embrace her—and was dragged screaming into the emerald waters below, never to be seen again.

skins.name: Urf the Nami-tee
skins.description: Nami doesn't quite understand the concept of Urf, but was told to don her apparel in honor of the great manatee known as Urf. She's happy to lounge around with her fellow manatee and manatee aficionados, but is quite perplexed as to why she's being shot out of a cannon.

skins.name: Deep Sea Nami
skins.description: “I saw her! Where light ceases and one is alone with the cold darkness and the sea, she appeared before me—a wordless, ancient thing, pulsing with an unearthly luster as vicious shapes twisted in the gloom beyond.”

skins.name: SKT T1 Nami
skins.description: Honoring Wolf's winning performance as Nami during the 2016 World Championship. This is Wolf's second World Champion skin, following his win with SKT at the 2015 World Championship.

skins.name: Program Nami

chromas.name: Program Nami

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2018.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2018.

skins.description: An aquatic search and rescue med-bot whose manufacturer was acquired in an aggressive corporate takeover, Nami has been irreversibly changed by the directives of Program. For now, she continues in her primary function… though her behavior has become increasingly erratic.

skins.name: Splendid Staff Nami

chromas.name: Splendid Staff Nami

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2019.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2019.

chromas.name: Splendid Staff Nami

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in 2019.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in 2019.

skins.description: When the demigoddess Irelia was bested by a heavenly empress, the seal over Talon's draconic power began to weaken… allowing some of his magic to leak into the world. Once a mere fish who dreamed of being a dragon, Nami has received some of this power, and has found her true form beginning to awaken.

skins.name: Cosmic Destiny Nami

chromas.name: Cosmic Destiny Nami

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

skins.description: The bringer of life, Nami is charged with scattering the seeds of 'Élan vital' on the newborn, cold lifeless rocks and planets that appear with the birth of new stars and constellations.

skins.name: Bewitching Nami

chromas.name: Bewitching Nami

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

skins.description: Bobbing for apples is certainly a lot more challenging when Nami brings the tides with her to the party. The apples don't bite back, but the pumpkin-fish do!

skins.name: Space Groove Nami

chromas.name: Space Groove Nami

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

skins.description: Fashioning herself as the Siren of the Cosmic Hot Tub, Nami's songs have crowds from across the galaxy flocking to catch one of her sets. So when the organizers of The Jam asked her to perform her songs at the most stellar of interstellar discos, her enthusiastic “Yes!” was a no-brainer.

skins.name: Prestige Space Groove Nami
skins.description: Nami has been serving up splashy looks at the Gala for a long time and has never been one to swim with the current trends. This season, she's showcasing her musical side, hoping to push the show to a new, groovier beat. With a stage as nice as the Gala's, why not dance on it?

skins.name: Coven Nami

chromas.name: Coven Nami

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

chromas.name: Coven Nami

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Worlds 2023 event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Worlds 2023 event.

skins.description: They called to Nami from the deep, their voice carrying a promise of power greater than any she had ever known. All Nami needed to do was feed it. She has now forsaken her oaths, her coven, spending endless nights lurking just below the murky waterways of the Elderwood in search of her next sacrifice to the Leviathan.

skins.name: Mythmaker Nami

chromas.name: Mythmaker Nami

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2025.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2025.

skins.description: Nami's ambition to control the waves led to a destructive battle between her and god-emperor Jarvan IV, causing a great calamity to befall the world. But when the world faces an even greater threat—human nature at its most devious—Nami must swallow her pride and work with her former enemies to stop their story from being rewritten.

passive.name: Surging Tides
passive.description: When Nami's Abilities hit allied champions they gain Move Speed for a short duration.

spells.name: Aqua Prison
spells.description: Sends a bubble to a target area, dealing damage and stunning all enemies on impact.
spells.dynamicDescription: Nami hurls a bubble, <status>Stunning</status> for @Effect2Amount@ seconds and dealing <magicDamage>@TotalDamageTT@ magic damage</magicDamage>.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Ebb and Flow
spells.description: Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions, healing allies and damaging enemies.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Nami unleashes a stream of water that bounces between allied and enemy champions. Each champion can only be hit once, and it hits up to @MaxTargets@ targets.
  • Restores @TotalHeal@ Health to allies and will bounce to a nearby enemy champion.
  • Deals @TotalDamage@ magic damage to enemies and will bounce to a nearby allied champion.
    The damage and healing value is modified by @BounceScaling@ each bounce. @SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Tidecaller's Blessing
spells.description: Empowers an allied champion for a short duration. The ally's basic attacks and spells deal bonus magic damage and slow the target.
spells.dynamicDescription: Nami empowers an allied champion's next @HitCount@ Attacks and Abilities for @BuffDuration@ seconds, causing them to <status>Slow</status> their targets by @TotalSlow@ for @SlowDuration@s and deal an additional <magicDamage>@TotalDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage>. @SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Tidal Wave
spells.description: Summons a massive Tidal Wave that knocks up, slows, and damages enemies. Allies hit gain double the effect of Surging Tides.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Nami summons a tidal wave, Knocking Up for 0.5 seconds, Slowing by @Effect4Amount@%, and dealing @TotalDamage@ magic damage. The duration of the Slow increases based on distance the wave traveled, up to @Effect5Amount@ seconds.

Allies hit by the wave gain double the effect of Surging Tides.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
